text: "Keep the Faith" is a song performed by Georgian singer Tamara Gachechiladze. The song represented Georgia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2017. It was written by Gachechiladze and Anri Jokhadze. The song was released as a digital download on 29 March 2017 through Universal Music. ==Eurovision Song Contest== Gachechiladze was confirmed to be taking part in Georgia's national selection for the Eurovision Song Contest 2017 on 11 December 2016. In the final, held on 20 January 2017, Gacheciladze won the jury vote and came second in the televote, winning the competition and earning the right to represent Georgia. The song was released as a digital download on 29 March, while its music video was released on 6 April. Georgia competed in the first half of the first semi- final at the Eurovision Song Contest. ==Track listing== ==Release history== {|class=wikitable ! Region ! Date ! Format !
